column2: "Farisiifo nye Sadusiifo bi bae bɔsɔɔ Jesus hwɛe bisaa no dɛ ɔnkyerɛ hɔn asɛnkyerɛdze a ofi sor."

column4: osiandɛ sor ayɛ kowioo na oemuna. Hom tum hwɛ wimu kyerɛ dza obesi

column2: "Ɔsantsen bɔn a wonndzi nokwar rohwehwɛ asɛnkyerɛdze
column3: na wɔremma hɔn asɛnkyerɛdze bi dɛ Jona dze no.  Na ogyaa hɔn hɔ kɔree."

column2: "Na esuafo no dur esuegya noho no
column3: nna hɔn werɛ efir dɛ wɔfa paanoo."

column4: na hom nhwɛ yie wɔ Farisiifo nye Sadusiifo mbɔrkaw no ho."

column5: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom susu se wɔ hom mu dɛ osiandɛ hom ammfa paanoo ntsi a?"

column3: anaa hom nnkaa nyimpa mpemenum paanoo enum no
column4: nye nkɛntsɛn dodow a hom fae no?"

column3: nye mbirefi dodow a hom fae no?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom nnhu dɛ nnyɛ paanoo ho asɛm bi na mereka? Na hom nhwɛ yie wɔ Farisiifo nye Sadusiifo mbɔrkaw ho."
"Nna wohun dɛ ɔannse hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ yie wɔ paanoo mbɔrkaw ho
column3: na Farisiifo nye Sadusiifo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho a."

column2: "Na Jesus dur Kaesarea Filipi afamu no
column4: Nyimpa se dɛ nyimpa Ba no nye woana?"

column3: Binom se John Onumanyi no a; binom se Elija a; na binom so se Jeremia anaa nkɔnhyɛfo no mu baako a."

column4: hom se dɛ woana nye me?"
Nyankopɔn tseasefo no ne Ba no."

column5: Jona ba; na nnyɛ honam nye bɔgya na woeyi akyerɛ wo
column6: na m'Egya a ɔwɔ sor no a."

column4: na ɔbotan yi do na medze m'asɔr besi; na samanadze aponkɛse rinndzi do nyim."

column2: "Medze sor ahenman ne nsaafee mebɛma wo: na biribiara a ebɛkyekyer wɔ asaase do no
column3: wɔbɛkyekyer wɔ sor; na biribiara a ebɛsan wɔ asaase do no

column2: "Nna ɔbraa n'esuafo no dɛ mma wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara dɛ ɔno nye Kraest no."
"Na ofitsi aber no na Jesus hyɛɛ ase kyerɛɛ n'esuafo dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ ɔkɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: na okohu amandze pii wɔ mpanyimfo nye asɔfompanyin
column6: na da a otsia ebiasa no ɔasoɛr."
Ewuradze: iyi remmba wo do da."

column4: Satan: eyɛ fintsidua ma me; osiandɛ enndwen Nyankopɔn dze

column3: Sɛ obi pɛ dɛ odzi m'ekyir a
column5: na ompegya ne mbeamudua na ɔnka mo do."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔgye no nkwa no
column4: na obiara a emi ntsi ɔbɛyew no nkwa no

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa nya wiadze nyina ma ntsi ɔhwer no nkwa a
column3: ebɛn mfaso na obenya? Anaa ebɛnadze na nyimpa bɛma dze asesa no nkwa?"

column2: "Na nyimpa Ba no dze n'Egya n'enyimnyam nye n'abɔfoe bɛba; na aber no na obotua nyimpa nyina kaw dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndzeyɛɛ tse."

column4: binom wɔ hɔ a wɔronnsɔ owu nnhwɛ ansaana woehu nyimpa Ba dɛ ɔreba wɔ n'ahendzi mu."
